1.0.name: wordpress/gridster-lite
1.0.description: Gridster is a tidy little portfolio theme for photographers and creative types. It has a grid-based homepage, left sidebar and space to show off your images in style. Full version of this theme includes a full-featured theme options panel and customer support, see http://themefurnace.com/blog/portfolio/gridster
